You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesR R] > &racute;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Racute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0154/index.htm U+00154].
  * `&racute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0155/index.htm U+00155].
